ValidationRule.description: If a client has linked this FP to an employment record, there might only be a match ID to establish this link, perhaps because the employment is not yet created. This rule ensures the employment is created and linked properly prior to validation.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && AND( ISPICKVAL(Validated__c, "Validated"), NOT(ISBLANK( OW_employment_match_id__c )), ISBLANK( OW_pension_employment__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This pension is linked to the customer's employment. Please validate the employment first.
